GAMEPAD SUPPORTED

"VERTI-GO HOME is like a rollercoaster ride, only that it's not safe :)"
- Am Rosenwald, CEO of Everything

“It feels like I’m controlling it with my mind. Wicked” 
- Hikko, the Sicko

"Don't play VERTI-GO HOME if you suffer from any emotional or psychological disorder. This game will make it worse."
- Your Mum

changelog.change_log: Hey y'all, we have brought back tilt steering! Not just that, we have worked a lot to improve it and make it smoother to use :)
Hey y'all, we have brought back tilt steering! Not just that, we have worked a lot to improve it and make it smooth to use :)
We have finally added checkpoints. Check it out y’all!
We have finally added checkpoints. Check it out y’all!
We have finally added checkpoints. Check it out y’all!

- We had to disable TILT STEERING because a lot of users weren't comfortable with it. It is a challenging way to play Verti-go home! and we really enjoy it ourselves, but we received so many comments complaining about it, that we had to react. If you are one of the few people that enjoys tilt steering in Verti-go Home! then please don't update. Because from now on the game is going to be GAMEPAD ONLY.
- We added game sounds to "new level"
